title: Wes Streeting – 2022 Comments on FIFA and OneLove Armband
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Wes Streeting, the Labour MP for Ilford North, on Twitter on 21 November 2022.
content:
FIFA is a disgrace.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development

But we know where @England and @FAWales stand and it’s appreciated. Players have been put in an impossible position.

Will be cheering England on today. A great team with a strong moral backbone – excellent role models for our country.
